messages.title: Vote Liberal Democrat for a Brighter Future
messages.content: Britain needs fresh vision and leadership to restore fairness in our country. The Liberal Democrats will build an economy that works for everyone, not just the richest. The Liberal Democrats will take the urgent action needed to protect our environment, making Britain a world leader in renewable energy and green technology. As Prime Minister, Jo Swinson will work every day to ensure our children get to go to the best schools in the world. The Liberal Democrats will invest billions more to secure the future of the NHS after years of Conservative neglect.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Britain needs fresh vision and leadership to restore fairness in our country. The Liberal Democrats will build an economy that works for everyone, not just the richest.
The Liberal Democrats will take the urgent action needed to protect our environment, making Britain a world leader in renewable energy and green technology.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Invest in Schools and Our NHS
keyPolicies.policyDescription: As Prime Minister, Jo Swinson will work every day to ensure our children get to go to the best schools in the world. The Liberal Democrats will invest billions more to secure the future of the NHS after years of Conservative neglect.

mentions.candidate: Laura Gordon is the hardworking MP Sheffield Hallam deserves.
mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: Both Tories and Labour have failed the country. Their track record is chaos and failings. 'Tories' failings', 'Labour shambles'.
mentions.partyLeader: As Prime Minister, Jo Swinson will work every day to ensure our children get to go to the best schools in the world. The Liberal Democrats will invest billions more to secure the future of the NHS after years of Conservative neglect. Jo Swinson is the Prime Minister we deserve.
mentions.tacticalSituation: After more than two years without an effective MP, local people are reclaiming Sheffield Hallam for someone who cares about the community.

issues.brexitEurope: I will fight to Stop Brexit, protect our public services and build a brighter future for everyone. The country deserves better than this mess.
issues.economy: Britain needs fresh vision and leadership to restore fairness in our country. The Liberal Democrats will build an economy that works for everyone, not just the richest.
issues.education: As Prime Minister, Jo Swinson will work every day to ensure our children get to go to the best schools in the world. More support for schools.
issues.environment: Tackle the Climate Emergency: The Liberal Democrats will take the urgent action needed to protect our environment, making Britain a world leader in renewable energy and green technology.
issues.health: The Liberal Democrats will invest billions more to secure the future of the NHS after years of Conservative neglect.

community.content: After more than two years without an effective MP, local people are reclaiming Sheffield Hallam for someone who cares about the community.

politicalExperience.achievements: Laura has dedicated her professional life to helping and empowering other people, particularly those whose voices are not as loud as others. Now she is focusing on our environment and the sustainability of our communities.

contactInformation.address: Freepost RSTK-HKSH-EJGE, Liberal Democrats, 8-10 Great George Street, London, SW1P 3AE

images.caption: Laura Gordon is the hardworking MP Sheffield Hallam deserves. (Image of Laura Gordon with supporters holding Liberal Democrats placards)
